item.title: Ductless Mini-Split Air Conditioning in Evansville & Louisville
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
Mini-splits, or ductless air conditioning, is an increasingly popular type of HVAC system. Like a heat pump, a ductless mini-split has an indoor and outdoor unit that heats and cools. However, ductless ACs directly transfer heat outdoors through a built-in air handler. Because they function independently, without air ducts, mini-splits provide zoned climate control when needed. You can save energy and money by only cooling the offices in use or not air conditioning the kids’ bedrooms while they’re away at college.

A+ Derr Heating and Cooling provides comprehensive mini-split services. We can install new ductless mini-splits and maintain or repair a ductless AC you already have.

Call A+ Derr Heating and Cooling at [site_info_phone_number], or contact us online to discuss ductless mini-splits for your home or business in Louisville, Evansville, Henderson, Owensboro, or Newburgh!

Ductless Mini-Split Installation & Replacement

If you want new AC or an AC replacement in your home or office, ductless AC installation is an efficient and affordable option in most situations. When you don’t want to pay to extend ductwork to a DIY sunroom, for example, a ductless AC is ideal. Mini-splits are also great for historic homes you’d rather not pull apart to install air ducts or new homes without ducts when you simply want to save money.

Ductless mini-splits are faster, easier, and less expensive to install than traditional ACs that require ductwork. They also don’t block views like window ACs and leave you free to let outside air in when heating and cooling aren’t needed. And because a single outdoor unit can support multiple indoor mini-splits with independent thermostats, ductless AC installation saves energy and suits various temperature preferences.

Without the inevitable waste of leaky ductwork, mini-splits are more efficient than other ACs. They’re a great option for air conditioning replacement since they’re affordable to install, run and adapt to all comfort preferences.

Call us at [site_info_phone_number], or contact us online to discuss switching to ductless AC!

[cta_shortcode]

Ductless Mini-Split Repair

If your ductless air conditioning needs repair, call A+ Derr for a fast, lasting fix. We’re available 24/7, so you never have to choose between leaving and suffering if your mini-split has a breakdown.

Call us for ductless AC repair if you notice:

  • Increased energy bills
  • A broken thermostat or remote control
  • Your AC is struggling to achieve your preferred temperature
  • Your air conditioner continually running
  • Leaks
  • Strange smells or noises

When your ductless AC isn’t fulfilling its responsibilities, count on A+ Derr to set things right. Call us at [site_info_phone_number], or contact us online today!

Ductless Mini-Split Maintenance

Schedule ductless mini-split maintenance in the spring and the fall for peak heating and cooling, fewer service calls, and a longer life for your mini-split. A technician will:

  • Clean the pipes, condensing unit, and evaporator coils
  • Balance the blower assembly and fan wheel
  • Clean or replace air filters
  • Inspect the condensate drain
  • Fix minor issues before they grow into significant problems that could cause a breakdown

Schedule your ductless AC maintenance service by calling [site_info_phone_number] or contacting us online.

Why Choose A+ Derr?

A+ Derr has served the HVAC needs of the Evansville, Louisville, Henderson, Owensboro, and Newburgh area for nearly 50 years. We understand how important AC is to health and happiness. Without air conditioning in the Kentuckiana summer, your work or home life can’t go as usual. That’s why we offer 24/7 air conditioning repair and hold to the motto: “Service Today or You Don’t Pay!”

We guarantee your 100% satisfaction. We provide free estimates on service calls and replacement quotes, and if you aren’t happy with your ductless mini-split installation after the first year, we’ll buy it back.

Call us at [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online to experience our top-tier customer service for yourself!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Ductless AC Installation & Repair In Evansville & Louisville
If you're considering switching to ductless or need service for your mini-split, call A+ Derr! 100% satisfaction guaranteed.

item.title: Ductless Mini-Split Installation in Evansville & Louisville
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
If you’re looking for effective and efficient air conditioning but don’t have or don’t want to deal with traditional air ducts in your home or business, ductless mini-split installation is the perfect solution. They’re long-lasting, sturdy, and solid; the ductless heat pumps provide heating and cooling and affordable, dependable comfort for 10 to 30 years, depending on the type of ductless system and how well it was installed and maintained.

For ductless AC installation in Newburgh, Henderson, Owensboro, and surrounding areas, call A+ Derr Heating and Cooling at [site_info_phone_number], or contact us online today!

Upgrading to Ductless AC

When you want to upgrade your current AC, a ductless mini-split offers many advantages. If you’re switching from window air conditioners to ductless AC installation, the benefits include saving the time, expense, and hassle of having air ducts installed throughout your home, as well as reclaiming your window views and ventilation.

Other benefits of upgrading to ductless AC in Louisville and Evansville include:

  • Energy-efficient, affordable operation
  • Consistent operation and cooling capacity
  • Improved indoor air quality
  • Reliable, eco-friendly comfort
  • Fast and easy installation
  • Individually controllable thermostats

Call A+ Derr Heating and Cooling at [site_info_phone_number], or contact us online about ductless mini-split installation in the Newburgh, Henderson, and Owensboro areas today!

[cta_shortcode]

The Benefits of Ductless Mini-Split Installation

Ductless mini-splits take advantage of cutting-edge HVAC technology to provide a range of notable benefits, such as:

  • Some of the highest energy efficiency ratings on the market, particularly with mini-splits that are also heat pumps
  • Quiet operation that won’t disturb sensitive people while they work or sleep
  • Zoning capabilities, meaning you can remotely and independently control each unit so that you don’t waste energy on spaces that aren’t being used, and individuals can experience their preferred level of comfort
  • Low maintenance for homeowners — schedule annual ductless AC maintenance or twice-a-year maintenance for ductless heat pumps, and your system will keep running as it should
  • Small, wall-mounted units that save space

Call A+ Derr Heating and Cooling at [site_info_phone_number], or contact us online about the benefits of ductless AC in Newburgh, Evansville, Louisville, Owensboro, and Henderson!

Why Choose A+ Derr?

When you’re ready to upgrade to ductless AC, call A+ Derr for your mini-split installation. Our fourth-generation, family-owned HVAC company has been pleased to serve Owensboro, Louisville, Evansville, Newburgh, Henderson, and surrounding areas for almost 50 years. We deliver high-grade workmanship and customer service from decades of experience.

To make you another happy A+ Derr customer, we guarantee your 100% satisfaction. Not only do we offer free service call estimates and replacement quotes, but if you aren’t happy with your new ductless AC installation after one year, we’ll buy it back!

Call A+ Derr Heating and Cooling at [site_info_phone_number] , or contact us online to make a plan for your ductless mini-split installation today!

item.title: AC Installation & Replacement Services in Evansville, IN & Louisville, KY
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
Homeowners in the Kentuckiana region recognize the need for a dependable AC unit ready to kick on when our summer temperatures hit. Whether a new AC unit is needed or you’re looking to replace your existing model, the team at A+ Derr Heating & Cooling has you covered! Our services will ensure your home is always cool and comfortable, guaranteed.

Ready to get started? Call [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online to set up an appointment!

How To Know When It’s Time To Replace Your AC Unit

Although issues with your AC unit are usually obvious, you may not always realize that they can indicate the end of its service life. In order to determine the need for a total system replacement, look out for the following signs:

  • Your unit is 10 to 15 years old
  • Your unit won’t turn on
  • Your unit doesn’t produce cool air
  • Your power bill is consistently high

Should any of the above be true for your unit, it’s time to consider an AC replacement. Request a free estimate by calling [site_info_phone_number].

[cta_shortcode]

How Long Are AC Units Expected To Last?

As mentioned above, AC units typically last 10 to 15 years, although the life span of your unit can vary due to a number of things. If your unit is always being used, it will be met with more wear and tear that will ultimately play a role in how long it will operate efficiently. If you are on top of repairs and annual maintenance, it could be that your specific unit lasts even longer than the average time frame!

Benefits of Replacing Your AC System

Your old, overused AC unit likely isn’t cutting it anymore. When you’re ready to work with A+ Derr to achieve a top-notch AC replacement, you can expect the following benefits:

  • Increased performance
  • Heightened comfort
  • Lowered power bills
  • An extended unit life span
  • Cleaner indoor air
  • Enhanced curb appeal

To learn more about the exceptional benefits of an AC replacement, contact us at [site_info_phone_number] !

Choose A+ Derr for Quality AC Installation & Replacement Services

A+ Derr Heating & Cooling, a fourth-generation family-operated company, has delivered dependable AC installation and replacement services to our community since 1975, and we are eager to keep the momentum going. We offer free estimates on replacement quotes, and we will always work hard to achieve 100% satisfaction! If you’re not happy with a product installed by us after the first year, we’ll buy it back. We also offer 24/7 emergency services for when issues can’t wait!

When you’re ready to guarantee your home is well-equipped for the hotter seasons, call us at [site_info_phone_number] or schedule an appointment with us online!

[bc_accordion][bc_card title="How do I choose the right AC unit for my home?"]

A surefire way to select the best AC unit for your home is with the help of an expert. We will consider things like the size of your home and how much energy you wish to use to determine the best option.

[/bc_card][bc_card title="When is the best time to have a new AC unit installed?"]

It’s best to have a new AC unit installed just before the summer hits to ensure you and your home are set up for success. This way you won’t have to go without cool air when the temperatures are the highest.

[/bc_card][/bc_accordion]

item.title: Duct Cleaning Services in Evansville & Louisville
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
Indoor air quality is a key factor in everyone’s overall well-being. One primary reason your home or office may suffer from indoor air pollution is a buildup of dust, allergens, and debris in the ductwork. Long-lasting air duct cleaning solutions from A+ Derr Heating and Cooling can transform the air quality in your home or business so that you can breathe easily.

Improve your indoor air quality with A+ Derr’s air duct cleaning solutions in Evansville, IN, Louisville, KY, and surrounding areas. Schedule your appointment at [site_info_phone_number], or contact us online today!

Signs You Need Duct Cleaning in Kentuckiana

If you aren’t sure whether you need your air ducts cleaned, consider if any of the following apply to your home or business:

  • A sudden increase in heating and cooling costs
  • Increased dust in your air and on surfaces
  • A recent renovation
  • Mold growing around your air conditioner or furnace

The longer you neglect dirty air ducts, the more effects of indoor air pollution you’ll face. These consequences range from increased allergies or chronic sinus infections to a never-ending need to dust and vacuum.

If you realize your air ducts need cleaning, call A+ Derr at [site_info_phone_number], or contact us online, and we’ll improve your indoor air quality!

[cta_shortcode]

Benefits of Duct Cleaning Services

Having your air ducts cleaned with A+ Derr will let you enjoy a wealth of advantages, including:

  • Improved energy efficiency
  • Less wear and tear on HVAC equipment
  • Cleaner, fresher, better-smelling air
  • Decreased heating and cooling costs
  • Fewer coughs and improved respiratory health
  • Decreased allergy and asthma symptoms
  • A cleaner home without more cleaning!

With a single visit from A+ Derr’s indoor air quality specialists, you’ll start to notice improvements in comfort, health, budget, and general quality of life at your home or business.

Call us today at [site_info_phone_number], or contact us online to enjoy long-lasting indoor air quality improvement in Louisville, Evansville, Newburgh, Henderson, and Owensboro.

Why Choose A+ Derr?

When it comes to indoor air quality at your Kentuckiana home or business, you want the best, including top-tier service, long-lasting results, and reasonable pricing. A+ Derr provides all of that with our air duct cleaning and a full range of additional HVAC and air quality solutions. We deliver customized comfort solutions across Owensboro, Henderson, Evansville, Louisville, Newburgh, and surrounding areas. You can trust we’ll get the job done right the first time. We’re so confident that we stand behind our work with a 100% satisfaction guarantee!

Enjoy the many benefits of newly cleaned air ducts! Call A+ Derr Heating and Cooling at [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online today!

[bc_accordion][bc_card title="Do you clean both supply and return ducts?"] Yes. The two sides are different: The supply ducts send air throughout your house, and the return ducts bring air back into your HVAC system. Both need professional cleaning. [/bc_card][bc_card title="How do I know if my ducts have mold? What can be done about it?"] Unfortunately, moisture and mold thrive in Kentuckiana homes. Mold is a contamination that poses health hazards, so don't ignore the signs you have mildew or mold in your HVAC ducts:
  • A mushroomy, mildew-like odor when your heating or cooling cycle kicks on is likely a mold problem. It can occur in one room or your entire home.
  • Increased allergy or asthma symptoms are associated with mold in ducts.
  • Inspect vents, walls, and flooring regularly for signs of mold. Moisture or stains on your ceilings and floors could be a structural or ductwork problem. (Some homeowners report upholstered furniture begins to feel damp.) If you see black, brown, green, or yellow growth on air vents, it's likely a mold issue.
[/bc_card][bc_card title="How often should I have my ducts cleaned?"] You should vacuum and clean your vents every year. If your vents become dust-covered more often, that's a sign you need professional duct cleaning. You can't effectively DIY ductwork cleaning. The National Air Duct Cleaners Association recommends cleaning every three to five years. [/bc_card][bc_card title="Is duct cleaning necessary if I have a new HVAC system?"] If you're replacing an older HVAC system, it's the perfect time to replace or clean air ducts. Even if you have a new home, dirt and airborne debris can linger in your ductwork after construction, so duct cleaning is recommended. [/bc_card][/bc_accordion]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Duct Cleaning in Evansville & Louisville | Air Duct Cleaners
Improve your home's energy efficiency, cut down on dust, and breathe easier with duct cleaning services from A+ Derr! Call to schedule an appointment.

Heating & Furnace Services in Newburgh, IN

Living in Newburgh means dealing with harsh winters. To make it through in comfort, you need a reliable heating system and a trustworthy HVAC team to service it. A+ Derr offers comprehensive heating and furnace services to Newburgh residents. You can count on us for:

  • Heating system installation and replacement
  • Heating repair
  • Heating maintenance

Don’t wait until the cold weather season to check your heating system! Call [site_info_phone_number] to ensure your system will be ready when you need it most.

Air Conditioning Systems in Newburgh, IN

A working AC is a necessity when a Newburgh summer hits. If your air conditioner suddenly goes out, you don’t want to be left in the heat. If that happens, turn to the experts at A+ Derr. We can help with any of your cooling issues, whether you need routine maintenance or a complex repair. Our services include:

  • Air conditioner installation
  • Air conditioner repair
  • Routine maintenance

Don’t sweat it out this summer! Contact A+ Derr at [site_info_phone_number] for quality air conditioning services in Newburgh.

Indoor Air Quality for Newburgh, IN

The air quality in your home is essential, but it can be easy to overlook. Our homes are much more efficient than they used to be. They are designed to keep the air in to efficiently heat and cool homes. While that’s great for your energy bill, it can cause poor air quality, which can worsen allergy and asthma symptoms, along with other negative side effects.

To ensure you have good indoor air quality, schedule a visit from one of our expert professionals. They’ll test your air and make recommendations based on your needs and budget to help keep quality air inside your home.

Should You Upgrade Your Newburgh, IN, HVAC System

Most quality HVAC systems last around 15 years with routine maintenance. As they age, all systems will begin to lose efficiency. It may be time to upgrade your HVAC system if:

  • The system is not blowing the correct air temperature
  • Some rooms are too hot or too cold
  • You hear strange noises coming from the system
  • Your system is more than 15 years old
  • Your HVAC system is noisy
  • Your HVAC system needs to be repaired more than once a year

If you think you may need an HVAC system upgrade, call the experts at A+ Derr at [site_info_phone_number]! We provide free estimates on system replacements.

Benefits of HVAC System Maintenance

With an investment like an HVAC system, you want to ensure it works efficiently and effectively. To keep it running smoothly, consider scheduling routine maintenance. Routine maintenance on your HVAC system can help prevent breaks and improve overall performance, including:

  • Extending the life span of the system
  • Increases energy efficiency
  • Improves performance
  • Fewer breakdowns
  • Lower energy bills

At A+ Derr, we offer comprehensive maintenance to keep your system working to the best of its ability. During our routine maintenance appointments, we check:

  • Refrigerant levels
  • System components
  • Thermostat recalibration
  • Part lubrication
  • Possible leakages
  • Overall performance tests

If you’re ready to schedule a routine maintenance check with A+ Derr, call [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online.

Choose A+ Derr for Your Newburgh, IN, HVAC Needs

If you’re in the market for an HVAC system maintenance, repair, or even a complete upgrade, A+ Derr’s expert technicians are here to serve you. Our long-standing commitment to assisting customers in the Newburgh, IN, area to feel comfortable in their homes all year long means we can help you with your system needs. You can be confident in choosing A+ Derr because our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee means you know the job is not done until you’re satisfied.

If you want A+ HVAC services, go with A+ Derr! Call [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online to schedule heating or air conditioning services in Newburgh.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
Your privacy is important to us, and this policy will inform you of the information that A+ Derr Heating & Cooling may collect from you, how it is used, and/or disclosed. By using our Website, www.aplusderr.com, you are acknowledging and accepting the practices and information described in this policy and on our Website.

Collecting Personal Information

When you visit our Website, we may collect personal and non-personal information such as: domain name, IP Address, type of Internet browser used, operating system, what brought you to our Website, which pages you visited, and the length of time you were on each page. We work with third parties, using cookies and other similar identifiers, to collect user data on our Website and elsewhere on the Internet for the purposes of tracking and advertising. Additionally, any information you willingly submit to us via our Website or otherwise will be collected. We may use this information to contact you in the future regarding specials, new products, services, or changes to this privacy policy.

Using Information

We may use the information we have collected primarily for our own internal purposes, including improving our products, services, Website, advertising, remarketing efforts, etc. However, we may also use your collected information to contact you to respond to inquiries or provide information about our services.

Protecting Information

A+ Derr Heating & Cooling generally follows accepted industry standards when it comes to protecting the information you submit to us and that we gather, both during transmission and once we receive it. We use appropriate data collection, storage, and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information, username, password, transaction information, and data stored on our site.

Web Browser Cookies

We may use "cookies" to enhance your experience on our Website. A cookie is a piece of data placed on your hard drive for record-keeping purposes by your web browser that may sometimes track information about you. You may choose to set your web browser to refuse cookies or to alert you when cookies are being sent. If you do so, note that some parts of the Site may not function properly. Usage of a cookie is in no way linked to any personally identifiable information on our site.

Sharing Information

We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal identification information to others. We may share generic aggregated demographic information not linked to any personal identification information regarding visitors and users with our business partners, trusted affiliates, and advertisers. We may also disclose your customer information with third parties in order to perform services on our behalf, and we will obtain consent for such sharing where it is legally required.

We will disclose personal information and/or an IP Address when required by law or in good-faith belief that such an action is necessary to: cooperate with an investigation of purported unlawful activity, protect the rights or property of our Website and related properties, or identify persons who may be violating the law, the rights of third parties, or otherwise misusing our Website or its related properties.

Please keep in mind that if you voluntarily submit your information in a public forum on our related to our Website—such as a comment section, discussion board, etc.—it may be collected and used by others, and we have no control of how third parties may use your publically accessible information. 

Third-Party Websites

A+ Derr Heating & Cooling's Website may contain links to third-party websites, including links to the sites and services of our partners, suppliers, advertisers, sponsors, licensors, and other third parties. We do not control the content or links that appear on these sites and are not responsible for the practices employed by websites linked to or from our Site. In addition, these sites or services, including their content and links, may be constantly changing. These sites and services may have their own privacy policies and customer service policies. Browsing and interaction on any other website, including websites which have a link to our Site, is subject to that website’s own terms and policies.

Privacy Policy Changes

A+ Derr Heating & Cooling may make changes to this privacy policy at our discretion. When we do, we will revise the updated date at the bottom of this page. We encourage you to frequently check this page for any changes to stay informed about how we are helping to protect the personal information we collect. By using our Website, you acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to review this privacy policy periodically and become aware of modifications.

Your Consent

By using this site, you signify your acceptance of this policy. If you do not agree to this policy, please do not use our Site. Your continued use of the Site following the posting of changes to this policy will be deemed your acceptance of those changes.

If you would like to opt out of our tracking, you may do so here:

http://www.aboutads.info/choices/

http://www.networkadvertising.org/choices/

If you have questions about our privacy policy, please contact us.

Last updated: 01-01-2023

item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
Your home is the place that you should feel the most comfortable in, but when your air conditioning stops working, it can quickly lead to an uncomfortable environment. When that happens, it’s time to call in the experts at A+ Derr, who can help with any cooling system issues that you might be having.

Having problems with your air conditioning? Give us a call at [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online!

AC Installation, Repair & Maintenance Services

Whether you need help with installing an entirely new air conditioner, repairing the one you currently have, or simply having a routine maintenance check scheduled, our team is ready and able to help.

How To Tell if Your AC Unit Needs To Be Repaired or Replaced

The best way to tell if your air conditioning needs to be repaired or replaced is to have one of our skilled professionals take a look, but there are some signs you can be on the lookout for at home, such as:

  • Your air conditioning blowing out warm air
  • The thermostat not working
  • Strange noises coming from the AC unit
  • Odd smells coming from the AC unit

Want to schedule an inspection with one of our technicians? Call us at [site_info_phone_number] or schedule an appointment online!

A+ Derr Is a Lennox Premier Dealer

At A+ Derr, we believe in providing you with the best air conditioning products in the market. That’s why we are proud to be a Lennox Premier Dealer! As a Premier Dealer, we have access to top-of-the-line AC products so that you can benefit from their enhanced cooling power. Lennox systems are energy-efficient, powerful, and reliable.

To learn more about Lennox products or to schedule an air conditioner replacement, contact A+ Derr at [site_info_phone_number].

24/7 Repair Service Available

We know that your air conditioning doesn’t always break during convenient business hours, so we offer 24/7 repair services. Whenever your AC breaks, one of our team members will be here to take your call!

Benefits of System Maintenance

Having a yearly system maintenance check performed on your air conditioning system helps to identify problems with your system that could become larger issues later. This will protect you against a broken AC and will also save you money on costly repairs later on down the line.

[cta_shortcode]

Frequently Asked AC Questions

[bc_accordion][bc_card title="When should I replace my air conditioning unit?"]

If your unit is older than 10 years old, it is a good time to start at least considering purchasing a new air conditioning unit.

[/bc_card][bc_card title="What is SEER?"]

SEER stands for Seasonal Energy Efficiency Rating and will tell you how energy-efficient your unit is — the higher the SEER number on your unit, the more efficient the unit is.

[/bc_card][bc_card title="How much money will a new HVAC or AC system cost?"]

The cost of a new HVAC or air conditioning system depends on your home and comfort needs. To get you the most accurate cost, please schedule an appointment with one of our comfort advisers. All estimates are free of charge and will ensure you are getting a precise and accurate price. Furthermore, with our 0% financing, we have actually seen AC and HVAC systems pay for themselves.

[/bc_card][bc_card title="What size HVAC equipment do I need?"]

To calculate the appropriate HVAC system size, we would need to schedule one of our comfort advisers to visit your home. Square footage, windows, insulation and ceiling height are just a few of the relevant items that will determine the type of AC system you need.

[/bc_card][/bc_accordion]

Why Choose A+ Derr?

A+ Derr has been proudly serving Evansville and Louisville for almost 50 years and has unsurpassed customer service. You can count on us for free estimates on our replacement quotes and 100% satisfaction guarantee on any product installed by us within the first year.

When you need air conditioning repairs, maintenance, or installations, call the A+ Derr team at [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online!

item.title: Ductless Mini-Split Repair in Evansville & Louisville
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
A ductless mini-split is an economical way to add air conditioning to rooms without air ducts or when you want to cool individual rooms. You can count on A+ Derr Heating & Cooling to have the tools, expertise, and customer service needed for a prompt, high-quality ductless HVAC repair.

Contact us online or call [site_info_phone_number] for professional, top-notch ductless mini-split repair, even after hours and on weekends, with our 24/7 emergency AC repair services.

Signs You Need Ductless AC Repair

Anyone would know that it’s time to call an HVAC professional when your air conditioner stops working altogether, but there are other signs and symptoms that you need ductless AC repair that are less obvious. These include:

  • Unresponsive controls
  • Dramatic temperature fluctuations
  • Increased utility bills
  • Water leaks
  • Your system can’t maintain thermostat settings
  • Ice on the cooling coils
  • Moldy or musty smells
  • Loud or unusual noises

Any of these signs should tell you it’s time to call A+ Derr for ductless mini-split repair. Schedule your appointment by calling [site_info_phone_number] or contacting us online!

[cta_shortcode]

Choose A+ Derr for Your Ductless HVAC Repair Services

For four generations, A+ Derr Heating & Cooling has served the Evansville, Indiana, and Louisville, Kentucky, areas, including Newburgh, Henderson, and Owensboro. Over the years, we have built up one of Kentuckiana’s leading HVAC technician fleets. We stand by our promise of “service today, or you don’t pay” because we take pride in our prompt professionalism.

We offer free estimates and aim for 100% customer satisfaction with every HVAC service, including ductless AC repair.

When you need ductless HVAC services in the Evansville and Louisville area, call A+ Derr at [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online.

Ductless Mini-Split Repair FAQs

[bc_accordion][bc_card title="Why is my mini-split leaking?"]

There are a number of reasons your ductless AC unit could be leaking. An issue with the defrost control setting is the most common. Other reasons include:

  • Frozen or clogged condensate line
  • Blocked drain line
  • Refrigerant leak
  • Damaged drain pan
  • Dirty air filter
[/bc_card][bc_card title="How can I prevent breakdowns and other issues with mini-split air conditioners?"]

The best way to keep your ductless AC unit working great for a long time is to keep it tuned up with regular maintenance services. The benefits of ductless AC maintenance include:

  • Improved performance
  • Increased energy efficiency
  • Extended life span
  • Fewer breakdowns and repairs
  • Lower monthly operating costs
[/bc_card][bc_card title="When should I replace my mini-split instead of having it repaired?"]

A ductless mini-split can last between 10 and 30 years. That’s a wide range, partly because of the different types and brands of mini-splits, but also, a ductless AC that is properly and regularly maintained will keep running well for additional years.

Here are some signs that it’s time to replace your air conditioner instead of calling for ductless AC repair:

  • Frequent water leaks
  • Frequent repairs
  • Necessary repairs are too expensive
  • The AC simply doesn’t cool well anymore
[/bc_card][/bc_accordion]

If your ductless mini-split is acting up, turn to the A+ Derr team for reliable repairs! Call us today to schedule service.

How Much Longer Can Annual Tune-Ups Extend an AC Unit’s Life Span?

On average, your AC unit will last around 10 to 15 years; however, this number depends on how well it is cared for! [bc_accordion][bc_card title="When should I schedule AC maintenance?"]

Scheduling AC maintenance before the warmer seasons hit is the best time; doing so will ensure your unit is in its best shape and won’t fail you when you need it the most!

item.title: A+ Derr's Community Involvement in Newburgh and Louisville
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
A+ Derr Heating & Cooling has always been deeply committed to positively impacting the communities where we operate. Our dedication to corporate social responsibility extends far beyond our business endeavors. We firmly believe in giving back to society. As part of our ongoing community involvement, we proudly support various initiatives in both Newburgh and Louisville that reflect our values and commitment to social betterment.

Call A+ Derr at [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online to schedule an HVAC appointment in Kentuckiana today.

Newburgh Community Involvement

We believe investing in the community's future begins with empowering the youth. That's why we're sponsoring a U8 Newburgh girls' softball team for the fall season. This sponsorship not only encourages young athletes but also fosters a sense of teamwork, discipline, and sportsmanship.

We also recognize the importance of arts and culture in a community. We're proud to sponsor a member of the Castle Show Choir at Castle High School. The arts play a vital role in the development of well-rounded individuals.

We also believe sports bring people together, and our commitment to the Castle baseball team through sponsorship of a golf scramble reflects our dedication to building a strong community in Newburgh. Supporting these athletes encourages athletic excellence and instills values of dedication and hard work.

Our community involvement in Newburgh extends beyond sports and arts to animal welfare. We actively participate in monthly rescue sponsorships through the A+ Pals Program for organizations such as the Animal Care Society and It Takes a Village. These partnerships reflect our deep concern for the welfare of animals and our commitment to making a real difference in their lives.

Louisville Community Involvement

We've forged a valuable partnership with the Animal Care Society as a business alliance partner. One of the highlights of our involvement with the Animal Care Society in Louisville is our sponsorship of the Bark in the Park 5K event at Seneca Park. This event not only promotes the welfare of animals but also brings the community together for a fun and meaningful experience. We are proud to be part of this event and look forward to making a positive impact.

Our commitment to sports and education in Louisville matches our efforts in Newburgh. We proudly sponsored the baseball team at PRP High School this past spring, and we plan to continue this support in 2024. The banner displaying our name on the field signifies our dedication to the youth and the local sports community.

We also supported Seneca High School FFA with a bowling night fundraiser. The funds raised from this event went toward their mission trip, allowing students to gain valuable experiences and skills that will shape their future.

A+ Derr Heating & Cooling's community involvement reflects our constant commitment to positively impacting the communities we serve. Our dedication to corporate social responsibility is not just a business strategy; it's a way of life that allows us to contribute meaningfully to the well-being and development of the communities we call home.

[cta_button]

Schedule an appointment for expert heating or cooling services in Evansville or Louisville by calling [site_info_phone_number]. Experience the A+ Derr difference.

When To Replace Your Heating System

Don’t wait too long to replace your furnace or heat pump! Ideally, you should install a new system before your old one breaks down. The following are signs that it’s time to arrange for your heating replacement:

  • Old age: If your heater is over 15 years old and it’s giving you trouble, now would be a good time to replace it.
  • Frequent repairs: Most heaters need repair services every few years, but if you need something fixed every winter, or the repairs are too pricey, you’ll save in the long run with a new heating installation.
  • Skyrocketing utility bills: If your heating bill keeps getting higher, or the cost seems unreasonable, your heating system is probably inefficient.
  • Uneven heating: If you sweat in your living room and shiver in your bedroom, your heater isn’t doing its job.

When you’re ready to replace your heating system in Evansville, IN, or Louisville, KY, call us at [site_info_phone_number] or reach out online for a free estimate.

Benefits of a New System

A new heating system will provide many benefits and advantages, and these only get better with a Lennox:

  • Lennox is known for being energy-efficient. Lennox’s ENERGY STAR®-qualified furnaces have up to a 99% efficiency rating, which means the energy they use is almost entirely channeled into producing heat, so you aren’t wasting power.
  • On top of efficiency, Lennox furnaces are some of the quietest manufactured today.
  • Their state-of-the-art technology produces ideal comfort and ensures your heat pump or furnace will last a long time.
  • Lennox heat pumps use Quantum coil technology with a sustainable aluminum alloy that protects against corrosion and reduces energy use.
  • A new heater will improve your indoor air quality. Lennox also offers indoor air quality solutions you can incorporate into your HVAC system to keep allergic, asthmatic, chronically ill, or senior family members healthier.

Experience the difference a Lennox heating system can make by calling [site_info_phone_number] or contacting us online. We provide free heating installation quotes in the Evansville and Louisville area.

Our fourth-generation family business offers one of the area’s biggest and most responsive technician fleets. We take care of our customers promptly and expertly, which is why we believe in “service today or you don’t pay”!

item.title: Heating Repair in Evansville, IN & Louisville, KY
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
When the temperatures drop, you’re going to want reliable heating in your home to keep you warm in Evansville, IN, and Louisville, KY. At A+ Derr Heating & Cooling, we provide complete care for your home heating systems to ensure your furnace, geothermal repair, boiler, or heat pump is ready for the first chill of the cold season. Our certified technicians are equipped with the tools, knowledge, and experience needed to get the job done right.

For all your home heating repair needs in Evansville, Louisville, and the surrounding areas, call [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online for a professional inspection, diagnosis, and repair solutions.

Signs You Need Heating Repair

It’s a known fact that all working systems will eventually need repair, and that includes your boiler, furnace, or heat pump. As a homeowner, it’s important to be aware of the signs that your heating system needs professional attention. The earlier you catch a problem, the better the likelihood that you’ll avoid overall system failure, resulting in expensive replacements. If you notice any of the following, it’s time to seek expert help:

  • Strange sounds: Boilers and furnaces are usually unobtrusive and make minimal noise. If you hear clanking, grinding, or banging sounds, this could be an indicator of loose parts, a broken fan, low water pressure, or something more serious. Our technicians can inspect your heating system and diagnose the problem.
  • Higher heating bill: It’s no coincidence that your poorly performing heating system and high utility bill are occurring together. An overworked system that isn’t performing efficiently is directly tied to the rising cost of electricity needed to keep your system running.
  • Unexplained smells: If you’re turning on your furnace at the beginning of the cold season, you may smell some fuel initially. However, these smells should soon evaporate. If your furnace has a lingering odor that stays, seek immediate attention from a professional.
  • Difficulty starting up unit: If your heating system is having difficulties running without disruption, then you could be encountering a disconnected wire or thermostat-related issue. A technician can inspect and repair the malfunctioning parts to restore full functionality.

At A+ Derr, our expert HVAC technicians are available 24 hours, seven days a week. Call [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online to get a professional out to your Evansville or Louisville home today! 

[cta_shortcode]

Why You Shouldn’t DIY Repairs

As a homeowner, there are lots of small fixes you’ll be able to perform on your own; however, it’s critical that you don’t undertake tasks that could cost you money, time, and injury. Boilers, furnaces, and heat pumps are complex systems with countless moving parts that must work together. Not only can a DIY repair lead to further damage to your system, but a poorly operating system can also result in higher operating costs and overall system failure. A trained technician can diagnose and identify the specific malfunction within your heating system and offer repair recommendations that save you money, prevent additional damages, and get to the root of the problem quickly.

Leave your repairs to the professionals! Contact A+ Derr at [site_info_phone_number] to schedule a heating repair in the Kentuckiana area.

Prevent Repairs With Regular Heating Maintenance

The key to longevity and durability is routine maintenance. Keeping your system repaired, cleaned, and in peaking working condition ensures that it will provide reliable service for years to come and prevent early system replacement. When you sign up for one of our HVAC maintenance plans, our technicians provide first-rate service and savings to keep your system running like new. With our Ultimate Savings Agreement, you’ll also enjoy benefits such as:

  • Priority service
  • Reduced service call fees
  • 15% discount on repairs
  • And more!

Protect your heating equipment by signing up for an Ultimate Savings Agreement! Call [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online today.

Why Choose A+ Derr Heating & Cooling?

Our fourth-generation family-operated company has always worked with a focus on customer satisfaction since 1975. Our motto is “service today, or you don’t pay” to ensure that our customers receive the best service to make their homes worry-free. With 24/7 availability and free estimates on replacement quotes, we are sure that our team of professionals will find the right solution for your home’s heating system.

[cta_button]

A+ Derr provides exceptional heating repair services for your malfunctioning heating system. Call [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online to schedule service in Evansville, Louisville, or the surrounding areas!

item.title: Reliable AC Repairs in Evansville, IN & Louisville, KY
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
Throughout the warmer seasons, homeowners rely on their AC unit to ensure their spaces are kept cool, comfortable, and safe. Should an issue with your cooling system occur, it’s pertinent to schedule an AC repair with a team of professionals ASAP! At A+ Derr Heating & Cooling, our team of established technicians has the necessary tools and knowledge needed to supply our community with top-notch AC repair services as needed.

24/7 Emergency Services

Some issues simply can’t wait. Should this be the case for you, A+ Derr proudly offers 24/7 emergency services that will have your unit back up and running in no time!

Don’t wait to schedule an AC repair with us! Call [site_info_phone_number] or set up an appointment with us online.

[cta_shortcode]

Common AC Issues That Indicate a Need for Repair

While issues with your AC unit are typically obvious, there may be some that are easy to overlook! Because of the necessity of your AC unit when temperatures rise, ensure you are always keeping an eye out for signs something may be amiss. Watch out for the following, and schedule service with us if you notice any of these:

  • Lack of airflow/problems with startup
  • Lack of cool air
  • Leaks
  • Loud noises
  • Off-putting odors
  • Unusually high utility bills

Notice any of the above? Contact us at [site_info_phone_number] for fast and dependable AC repairs.

Steps To Troubleshoot Before Calling A+ Derr

Fortunately, there are ways in which you can troubleshoot your AC unit yourself before the help of a professional is needed. For a quick fix, try the following tips and tricks, and you just may be able to jump-start your unit yourself:

  • Reset your AC unit
  • Check to ensure your thermostat is operating properly
  • Ensure the unit door is closed
  • Change/clean your unit’s filters
  • Double-check that your unit is connected to power

If the above tricks don’t work for you, schedule with us by calling [site_info_phone_number] or contacting us online.

Should I Repair or Replace My AC Unit?

Generally speaking, if your AC unit is under 10 years old, it’s rare that you will need to replace it over having it repaired. There are some instances in which a replacement is your best bet, though. Age is the top determiner, so if your unit has been running for 10 to 15 years, it’s likely time for an upgrade. Furthermore, if your unit is damaged beyond repair, a replacement is definitely needed. The best way to determine the move you should make is by having an A+ Derr professional out to assess the situation!

Call [site_info_phone_number] to discuss your repair options, or if you’re ready to replace your AC, contact us to request an estimate.

[bc_accordion][bc_card title="When should I have my AC unit repaired?"]

If your AC unit is met with issues that are hindering its performance, you shouldn’t wait to schedule an AC repair with us to get things back up and running. Delaying repairs will lead to worsening issues and possible shutdowns.

[/bc_card][bc_card title="Why are my energy bills so high?"]

Abnormally high energy bills can be due to your AC unit utilizing more energy than it should be. If this is the case for you, there is likely an issue with it that should be addressed and corrected ASAP.

[/bc_card][/bc_accordion]

Why Choose A+ Derr for Quality AC Repair Services?

Since 1975, the team at A+ Derr Heating & Cooling has supplied the residents of Evansville, Louisville, and the surrounding areas with comprehensive AC repair services, and we understand the importance of delivering prompt services our clients can always rely on. We are a fourth-generation family-operated company, meaning we will always value establishing close-knit relationships. We aim to achieve 100% satisfaction each and every time, and we are proud to offer free estimates on replacement quotes and service calls!

We stand by our motto of “Service Today or You Don’t Pay!” Call [site_info_phone_number] or message us online to schedule AC repairs with our trustworthy team.

item.title: Welcome to the thoughtful home.
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
Your home keeps you safe, warm and comfortable. But what if it could do more? What if it knew you? And what you liked? Imagine if it could help you. If it could take care of things for you. Turn down the heat. Tell you if there’s trouble. This is the kind of home automation we’re creating.
The thoughtful home.

Nest Learning Thermostat

Programs itself. Then pays for itself.

Nest learns the temperature you like when you’re home and turns itself down when you’re away.
The home automation, Nest Learning Thermostat controls half your energy bill – more than appliances, more than electronics.

  • Auto Schedule – Just turn it up and down. It learns the temperatures you like and programs itself.
  • Remote control – Change the temperature from anywhere using your smartphone, tablet or laptop.
  • Hello, Leaf. – Know you’re saving energy. Look for the Nest Leaf when you change the temperature.
  • Auto-Away. – It automatically adjusts the temperature after you leave. So you don’t heat or cool an empty home.
  • Energy History. – Check your Energy History on your phone to see how much energy you use and why.
  • Early-On. – Finally, Nest learns how your home warms up and keeps an eye on the weather to get you the temperature you want when you want it.

[cta_shortcode]

Nest Protect

The smoke and CO alarm that thinks, speaks, and alerts your phone.

There’s never been a smoke and carbon monoxide alarm quite like this. The home automation, Nest Protect looks for fast-burning fires, smoldering fires, and carbon monoxide. It also speaks up when there’s a problem and can even message your phone in case you’re not home.

  • Get alerts on your phone – Nest Protect can send you a message when there’s a problem or the batteries run low.
  • Tells you what and where – Nest Protect speaks up if there’s smoke or CO and tells you where it is.
  • Sees the CO you can’t – Carbon monoxide is an invisible, poisonous gas. Nest Protect tells you where it’s hiding.
  • Every second counts – The Split-Spectrum Sensor looks for both fast and slow burning fires.
  • Hush from the Nest app – Just burned the toast? App Silence lets you quiet the alarm right from your phone.
  • Up to 10-year life span – Most of all, Nest Protect’s long-lasting CO sensor keeps you safe and sound for up to a decade.

Nest Cam

See your home automation on your phone. Get alerts that matter.

Nest Cam helps you keep an eye on what matters to you. It looks for motion and listens for sound, and if something’s up, it sends an alert to your phone.

  • See every detail – Securely stream 1080p HD video to your phone, tablet or laptop.
  • No light? No problem – Keep an eye on things around the clock. With Night Vision, you can see in the dark.
  • Find out what you missed – Continuously record up to 30 days of video in the cloud with a Nest Aware subscription.
  • Get alerts on your phone – Nest Cam tells you if there’s motion or sound in your home while you’re gone.
  • Talk and listen – Hear when the baby wakes up. Or tell your dog to get off the couch.
 

 

 

Google Home

Google Home is a voice-activated speaker powered by the Google Assistant. Ask it questions. Tell it to do things. It’s your own Google, always ready to help. Just start with, “Ok Google”. Home automation at its finest.

  • Command your audio – A simple voice request triggers Google Home to play music, podcasts or radio from services like Google Play Music, Spotify, YouTube Music, Pandora and TuneIn.
  • Get answers from Google – Thanks to Google’s rich history in search, Google Home is ready for your questions. Get real-time answers including the latest on weather, traffic, finance, sports, local businesses and more.
  • Plan to do more – With your permission, Google Home will learn about you and get personal. Google Home can retrieve your flight information, set alarms and timers, and even tell you about the traffic on your way to work.
  • Voice-control your smart devices – Google Home connects seamlessly with smart devices like Chromecast, Nest and Philips Hue, so you can use your voice to set the perfect temperature or turn down the lights.

Nest Cam Outdoor

Security, rain or shine. Home automation on your phone 24/7.

Nest Cam helps you keep an eye on what matters to you. It looks for motion and listens for sound. Furthermore if something’s up, it sends an alert to your phone.

  • See every detail – Securely stream 1080p HD video to your phone, tablet or laptop.
  • No light? No problem – Keep an eye on things around the clock. With Night Vision, you can see in the dark.
  • Find out what you missed – Continuously record up to 30 days of video in the cloud with a Nest Aware subscription.
  • <ityle="color:#004287;" aria-hidden="true">
    Get alerts on your phone – Nest Cam tells you if there’s motion or sound in your home while you’re gone.
  • Talk and listen – Hear when the baby wakes up. Or tell your dog to get off the couch.

Nest Hello Doorbell

Help your customers know who’s knocking from anywhere, so they never miss a visitor or a package.

  • Get an alert and talk to visitors, even if no one is home.*

  • 24/7 streaming and a 3-hour snapshot history.

  • HD video delivers bright, crisp images.

  • Smart enough to detect a person even if they don’t ring, then send an alert.

  • HD Talk and listen makes sure visitors come through loud and clear.

  • See people head to toe or packages on the ground.

item.title: Indoor Air Quality Services in Kentuckiana
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
If your northern Kentucky or southern Indiana home has poor indoor air quality, you may struggle with discomfort and genuine health problems, including eye or nose irritation, respiratory problems, dry skin, and more.

At A+ Derr Heating & Cooling, our highly skilled team has the training and top-quality products to improve indoor air quality, leaving you with fresher, healthier air.

Contact us at [site_info_phone_number] today to learn more or schedule IAQ services in Evansville, Louisville, and the surrounding areas.

Our Indoor Air Quality Services

The A+ Derr team offers various indoor air quality services to accommodate any family’s needs. We proudly install and service:

  • Air purifiers: These remove odorous and harmful gases such as cooking odors, bacteria, and viruses from the air, so you’re left with healthier, fresher air year-round.
  • High Efficiency Air Cleaners: Air scrubbers remove dirt, dander, pollen, bacteria, and more from your air while purifying and disinfecting, leaving you with distinctly cleaner, healthier air free of harmful pollutants.
  • Humidifiers: Humidifiers help maintain a healthy humidity level, preventing problems such as dry skin, nose and eye irritation, and higher chances of getting sick. 
  • Dehumidifiers: Dehumidifiers also help maintain ideal humidity by keeping the air from getting too humid, leading to mold, mildew growth, and overall discomfort. Dehumidifiers are also crucial for keeping basements dry.
  • Duct cleaning: Dust, allergens, and debris in your home’s ductwork can negatively affect your indoor air quality. Duct cleaning solutions from A+ Derr can improve indoor air quality, ensuring that you and your family breathe easier.

Call us today at [site_info_phone_number] to schedule indoor air quality services for your Kentuckiana home.

How to Tell if You Have Poor Indoor Air Quality

You may worry about whether your town’s air is polluted, but you should know that the air in your home can be up to five times more polluted than outdoor air.

Here’s how to tell if you have poor indoor air quality:

  • You wake up with a dry throat every morning: Frequent dry or itchy eyes, dry throat, nose bleeds, and sneezing are all signs that your air is too dry. Dry air also increases your risk of catching airborne illnesses.
  • The air feels muggy or sticky: If it always feels humid and sticky in your house, you likely need a whole-home dehumidifier. Aside from discomfort, excess humidity also encourages mold and mildew growth.
  • Someone has a respiratory condition: If someone in your home has a respiratory condition, their symptoms are likely worse in a house with polluted air. 
  • Your air never smells fresh: Cooking, pet odors, cleaning chemicals, mold and mildew, smoking, and more can cause unpleasant and unhealthy odors that can’t be removed by cleaning or opening a window.

Contact our team today at [site_info_phone_number] to schedule indoor air quality services.

Why Choose Us for Indoor Air Quality Services in Evansville or Louisville? 

At A+ Derr, we have over 50 years of experience improving indoor air quality for northern Kentucky and southern Indiana residents. Our proven reputation for excellent service and products makes us the team to call when you need healthier, fresher air in your home. 

Contact our team today at [site_info_phone_number] to schedule indoor air quality services in Kentuckiana.

Indoor Air Quality FAQs

[bc_accordion][bc_card title="How can I keep the air in my home cleaner? "]

Here are some things you can do regularly to keep your home’s air fresher and healthier year-round: 

  • Clean or replace the filter in your HVAC system at least every three months, and more often if you have pets or someone smokes in the house.
  • When the weather permits, open windows to circulate fresh air.
  • Always use the vent fan over your stove when cooking to reduce humidity from steam.
  • Vacuum once a week if you have two or more pets that shed fur. 

[/bc_card][bc_card title="What kinds of pollutants are common in indoor air? "]

Indoor air is polluted by particles, germs, and chemicals. All three can cause respiratory problems, fatigue, and an increased risk of getting sick. They can also reduce the service life of your HVAC equipment and lead to more frequent repair needs.

[/bc_card][bc_card title="How do I know which IAQ system is best for my home?"]

The need for indoor air quality systems is obvious, such as a dehumidifier if your air is too humid or you notice mold or mildew growth. Other issues don’t have an obvious solution, so our experts can assess your home’s air and make a professional recommendation.

[/bc_card][/bc_accordion]

item.content:encoded:
Your heat pump is a system that you need working on all cylinders throughout the year, so be sure it’s ready and equipped for when you need it. Since pumps transfer heat instead of generating it, you rely on them on cold and hot days. By scheduling regular maintenance appointments with A+ Derr Heating & Cooling, our team will ensure that your heat pump is always up to the task! 

Contact the A+ Derr team online or call [site_info_phone_number] to schedule heat pump maintenance services in northern Kentucky or southern Indiana today!

Maintenance Visits in Kentuckiana

Our maintenance visits can tackle a host of potential problems that may pop up with your heat pump down the line. During a maintenance appointment, our team can:

  • Oil fans and motors on your unit
  • Change out air filters
  • Clean condenser coils
  • Empty the system’s condensation pan

For any questions or to schedule an appointment, contact us today at [site_info_phone_number] or reach out to us online.

Benefits of Heat Pump Maintenance

You may know that regular maintenance keeps your heat pump working, but some of the other benefits include: 

  • Saving on energy bills
  • Extending the life span of your unit
  • Identifying smaller problems before they become big ones
  • Peace of mind

To learn more about the benefits of heat pump maintenance, contact A+ Derr Heating & Cooling today at [site_info_phone_number] .

[cta_shortcode]

Why Choose A+ Derr Heating & Cooling?

For over 50 years, A+ Derr has served our community’s home service needs. We appreciate and respect all our customers, which is why we offer upfront pricing, honesty, and highly trained technicians. Trust our team for heat pump maintenance or any other service you might need in your home. Reach out to us today!

Contact our team at [site_info_phone_number] or schedule an appointment online for maintenance in the Kentuckiana area.

Heat Pump Maintenance FAQs

[bc_accordion][bc_card title="How often should I have my heat pump serviced?"]

You should have your heat pump serviced at least once a year. If you use your heat pump for heating and cooling, you should service it twice annually, in the fall and the spring.

[/bc_card][bc_card title="What is the life span of a heat pump?"]

The average life span of a heat pump is 10-15 years. Because heat pumps run year-round to heat and cool your home, they don’t always last as long as a typical heating or cooling system. However, you can extend the life span by ensuring that your unit is routinely maintained by an HVAC professional.

[/bc_card][/bc_accordion]

item.content:encoded:
Ductless mini-splits are a great option for homeowners, as they give you the ability to heat individual rooms. Having this flexibility with your home’s heating system can help you save money and energy by only heating the rooms you need, or it can be a good supplemental option for rooms that need extra heat. Whatever the case may be, A+ Derr Heating & Cooling provides top-notch ductless heating installations, repairs, and maintenance in the Kentuckiana region.

Ductless Heating Installation & Replacement

Get control over your home’s heating by having ductless mini-splits installed! This heating option is great for individual rooms or to add heating to a home without ductwork. If you’re considering this option, A+ Derr can help you determine the ideal layout and number of mini-splits for your home. Then, our technicians will seamlessly install your units, so that you can start enjoying a warm and cozy home. We’re also here to help when your ductless units need to be replaced.

Call [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online to request a free estimate for a ductless-mini split installation in Evansville or Louisville.

[cta_shortcode]

Ductless Mini-Split Repair

If your ductless mini-splits are struggling to keep your home warm, call A+ Derr for a fast and long-lasting fix! Our team is available 24/7, so you can call us anytime you have an emergency on your hands.

Keep an eye out for the following signs that your ductless heating units need repair:

  • Insufficient heating
  • No airflow
  • Increased energy bills
  • Unresponsive thermostat
  • Strange noises

Call [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online to schedule ductless heating repairs! We’re available 24/7.

Ductless Heating Maintenance & Tune-Ups

To run at their full capacity, ductless mini-splits need regularly scheduled professional maintenance. The A+ Derr team provides comprehensive maintenance services for you to enjoy all the benefits of your ductless heating system. Our technicians will thoroughly inspect and tune up your ductless mini-splits, catching any problems early on. Other benefits of our professional maintenance services include:

  • Longer system life span
  • Improved energy-efficiency
  • Enhanced heating power
  • Lower energy bills

Schedule your next tune-up in the Evansville or Louisville area by contacting A+ Derr at [site_info_phone_number].

Schedule Ductless Heating Services With A+ Derr

At A+ Derr Heating & Cooling, our team has proudly served the HVAC needs of Evansville, Louisville, Henderson, Owensboro, Newburgh, and the surrounding areas since 1975. Our unwavering commitment to customer service and quality workmanship has made us a premier choice for heating and ductless mini-split services.

To make life easier for our customers, we provide 24/7 emergency service, free estimates on service calls and replacement quotes, and a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you’re not happy with a ductless mini-split installed by our team after the first year, we’ll buy it back.

Call A+ Derr at [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online to schedule ductless heating services in Evansville, IN, Louisville, KY, or the surrounding areas.

Frequently Asked Questions

[bc_accordion][bc_card title="Do I need a ductless mini-split in every room?"]

That’s up to you! If your using ductless mini-splits as your main source of heating, then you should have one unit per every room that needs to be heated. If you’re just looking to add heating to individual rooms, then only those rooms will need a unit.

[/bc_card][bc_card title="Is ductless heating energy-efficient?"]

Ductless mini-splits have proven to be impressively efficient! Because they offer zone control, you can set rooms that aren’t being used to be heated less, which can help you save on energy costs.

[/bc_card][bc_card title="When should I replace my ductless mini-splits?"]

Ductless HVAC units typically last around 20 years or more with regular maintenance. If your units are older than 20 years or struggling to keep your house warm, it’s time for a replacement.

[/bc_card][/bc_accordion]

item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
Any property owner with ductless mini-splits knows the many benefits of this energy-efficient, zone-controlling HVAC system. It’s important to remember that because ductless heating systems run year-round by providing AC in the summer, they need professional maintenance twice a year.

At A+ Derr Heating & Cooling, we proudly offer comprehensive ductless heating maintenance to our northern Kentucky and southern Indiana-area customers.

Call [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online to schedule ductless heating maintenance today.

Our Ductless Heating Maintenance & Tune-Ups

Every HVAC system needs regular maintenance to keep running at optimal efficiency for years to come. Our trained technicians can help you take full advantage of your ductless heating system with our maintenance services.

he many benefits of ductless heating maintenance include: 

  • Longer system service life
  • Lower energy bills
  • Improved energy efficiency
  • Better indoor air quality

Contact us today at [site_info_phone_number] to schedule ductless heating maintenance or tune-up in Kentuckiana.

Do You Need Ductless Heating Maintenance?

Every ductless system needs maintenance, but what if you’re not sure your ductless heating system is in good condition? Here are a few signs to look out for that could mean it’s time to schedule ductless heating maintenance:

  • It’s been a year or longer since its last maintenance service.
  • The system isn’t heating sufficiently.
  • Your energy bills are increasing without an apparent reason.
  • Your thermostat is unresponsive.
  • The system is making strange noises.

If you notice these or any other issues with your ductless heating system, call our team today at [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online to schedule maintenance .

Why Choose A+ Derr for Ductless Heating Maintenance?

At A+ Derr Heating & Cooling, our technicians have the experience and training to provide the highest quality maintenance for your ductless heating and any other HVAC system you have. When you work with our team, you can expect: 

  • Top-quality products
  • Satisfaction guaranteed
  • Upfront pricing
  • Over 50 years of industry experience
  • And more!

Call [site_info_phone_number] today or contact us online for top-notch ductless heating system maintenance in northern Kentucky or southern Indiana.

Ductless Heating Maintenance FAQs

[bc_accordion][bc_card title="What happens during routine ductless heating maintenance? "]

When you schedule maintenance with A+ Derr, our technicians will:

  • Clean dirt and debris from around the outside unit.
  • Replace the filter in each unit.
  • Check all electrical connections and safety features for proper operation.
  • And more

They’ll also identify any issues that should be addressed before they worsen, ensuring a longer service life for your system and fewer repair needs.

[/bc_card] [bc_card title="Do I really need ductless heating maintenance twice a year?"]

Generally, yes, but it depends on how frequently your system is used throughout the year. It needs maintenance in the spring and fall if you consistently rely on it for heating and cooling. If you rely on it only for heating or only for cooling, yearly maintenance may be enough.  You can always contact our team for expert advice if you're unsure.

[/bc_card] [bc_card title="Can I maintain my ductless heating system between maintenance appointments? "]

Yes! There are a few simple things you can do to keep your system running smoothly month after month: 

  • Clean or replace the air filter at least every three months.
  • Keep clutter and debris away from the indoor and outdoor units to protect the equipment and maintain good airflow.
  • Visually inspect each unit regularly so you can spot potential issues early and promptly schedule repairs.
[/bc_card] [/bc_accordion]

item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
To ensure that your Evansville or Louisville home is cozy all through the bitterness of winter, you’ll need your furnace working efficiently and effectively. Trust the experts at A+ Derr with your comprehensive furnace service needs, including repair, maintenance, and installation. With free estimates on system replacements and service calls, A+ Derr is your call for comfort!

For high-quality furnace services in Kentuckiana, call A+ Derr at [site_info_phone_number] or contact us online! 

Replacement Services

If your furnace is no longer functioning correctly, it may be time for a replacement. The experts at A+ Derr are here to ensure that your home receives only the best products and installation services — that's why we’re a Lennox Premier Dealer. As the leading manufacturer of HVAC systems, Lennox makes one of the highest-quality furnace options. With the A+ Derr technicians’ expertise, your home will be warm and comfortable all winter.

When your furnace shows any of these signs of failure, call A+ Derr for prompt replacement services:

  • Increased energy bills: If you notice a sudden spike in your energy bills, it likely means that your furnace is no longer heating efficiently. This could be due to aging parts of the furnace. 
  • Uneven heating: If you notice cold spots or the rooms in your home are not receiving equal heat, this is likely because of your furnace. As your system ages, it can struggle to push heat evenly through the ducts in your home.
  • Moisture in the home: Damp air or moisture on your walls or windows may indicate insufficient airflow. Though this could be a problem with your vents, it may also indicate that your furnace isn’t functioning properly.
  • Frequent need for repairs: Most furnaces, if well maintained, last about 20 years, but as they age, they will often require frequent repairs and service. If you’re constantly paying to fix problems, upgrading your system may be a better financial decision.

[cta_shortcode]

Gas vs. Electric Furnaces

When choosing the right heating system for your home, it’s vital to consider the differences between gas and electric furnaces to select the best option. Both are excellent home heat sources and require similar annual maintenance to ensure efficiency. The difference is primarily in their source of energy. A gas furnace utilizes fossil fuels to use combustion to create heat, whereas electric furnaces use electricity through heating coils. The difference in cost to install and run these two systems is often negligible as both are excellent and energy-efficient choices. 

To learn more about which system is best for your Kentuckiana home, contact A+ Derr online or call [site_info_phone_number] today!

Benefits of Upgrading Your Furnace

Upgrading your furnace, especially with one of our high-quality Lennox options, can significantly benefit your home. With a new furnace, you can expect:

  • Greater heating efficiency: Not only do new furnaces operate more efficiently, but new technology may also mean that an upgraded unit can provide better heat distribution in the home.
  • Lower utility bills: Your new furnace won't struggle to keep up with your home’s heating needs, meaning energy consumption will go down.
  • Improved airflow: A new furnace can improve air circulation through your home’s ventilation system.

Schedule an appointment to upgrade your furnace with A+ Derr today by calling [site_info_phone_number] or contacting us online.

For the highest quality furnace services in Evansville and Louisville, call the experts at A+ Derr. We’re a fourth-generation family-operated company dedicated to our customers' satisfaction. With 24/7 service, you can trust that A+ Derr will be there when you need them most.

[bc_accordion][bc_card title="How long will my new furnace last?"]

At A+ Derr, we install the best furnaces on the market — Lennox furnaces. These high-quality options, when maintained properly, can last more than 20 years.

item.title: Ductless Heating Installation in Evansville
item.dc:creator: bluecorona_seo
item.content:encoded:
Heating is essential to every home in Evansville and Louisville, KY. Without a sound heating system, you risk busted pipes and terrible health conditions—Trust A+ Derr Heating & Cooling for ductless heating installation services.

We install ductless systems that are designed to heat single rooms efficiently. These units work independently of any other heating system, providing comfortable temperatures for a single space.

Take control of your climate with ductless mini-split installation from A+ Derr. Contact us online or call [site_info_phone_number] to get started.

Expert Ductless Heating Installation

Adding a ductless heating unit is a breeze with A+ Derr on the job. We’ve installed countless units throughout the Evansville and Louisville regions. 

Staying warm can be challenging without a properly functioning heating system. You may need to replace a heating system if:

  • Certain rooms don’t warm up
  • Your system constantly needs repairs
  • Your energy bills are through the roof

Be sure you have the proper heating to handle the cold winter months—schedule ductless mini-split installation in Kentuckiana today by contacting us online or calling [site_info_phone_number].

Benefits of Installing a Ductless Heating System

Ductless heating units provide a wealth of benefits to any homeowner who installs them. Just a few perks of these systems include:

  • Total climate control: Ductless systems provide you with complete control over the temperature in the installed room.
  • Energy efficiency: Heat or cool a single room rather than the entire house.
  • Easy installation: Professional installation can be done in as little as a day.
  • No ductwork required: No need for costly revamping of your current duct system.

Enjoy consistent heating for any room in your home with a ductless mini-split. Contact us online or call [site_info_phone_number] to get started on the installation.

Why Choose A+ Derr Heating & Cooling?

A+ Derr has served Evansville and Louisville with top-notch HVAC services since 1975. Our licensed and insured technicians guarantee your satisfaction. We offer 24/7 services, free estimates on replacement quotes, and installation of Lennox-brand systems that are made to last.

Trust a 4th-generation family-owned business to handle all your HAVC issues. Schedule service today by contacting us online or calling [site_info_phone_number].

Ductless Heating FAQs

[bc_accordion][bc_card title=" Are mini-splits good for heating?"]

Yes! Mini-splits can heat or cool a single room in your home using their own heating and cooling elements.

[/bc_card][bc_card title=" Can a mini-split heat a whole house?"]

No. A mini-split will only provide climate control for a single room, although every room in the home can be equipped with a unit.

[/bc_card][bc_card title=" How often should a mini-split be cleaned?"]

A mini-split unit should be cleaned every few months to keep it running efficiently. Much like a regular HVAC system, these units have air filters that require regular cleaning. 

[/bc_card][/bc_accordion]

  • Installation & replacement
